channel.title: Online Education on
channel.description: Recent content in Online Education on

item.title: Creating Video Lessons with Online Video Maker InVideo
item.description: In this course you will learn how to create a dynamic and attention-grabbing video lectures fast and easy with InVideo. Together we shall go through all steps of creating process, starting from InVideo features, designing a lecture by scenes, adding and editing a voiceover. You can use your article/post/thesis and get a custom video lecture in the end of this course. Or you can use the attached materials to this course: my company’s article on 4 Principles of Design in PowerPoint, a text for a voiceover and a script for each scene, graphic materials regarding the topic, and mp3 files for a voiceover.

item.title: Udemy Course Creation - Udemy Instructor Guide (Unofficial)
item.description: Have you dreamt of being a Udemy instructor? Have you thought about how to create your first course? It doesn't have to be difficult. This is an in-depth course that will take you through every stage needed to create a great Udemy course. From planning, to production, and finally publishing your video course, this comprehensive guide will have you creating your own Udemy courses within weeks. This comprehensive guide will walk you through the process of creating your own Udemy course from start to finish.

item.title: Course Creation On Udemy Passive Income Monthly~Unofficial
item.description: Would you like your own e-learning course business where you make money while you sleep? I have launched over 30 Udemy Courses with 750K Students and more than 3800+ Reviews, I will teach you exactly how I build my passive income empire from scratch on Udemy since 2018. If you are good at anything and can teach it to other people then this is for you. Get ready to build a passive income stream through Udemy and follow my secret strategy to success!

item.title: Creating Your First Udemy Course For Beginners - Unofficial
item.description: I know its difficult time for many especially those whose jobs has been affected with a lack of economic activities during the recent lockdown. When I go grocer shopping, I see many people just having a look of uncertainty and have worried about their financial well being. Even my personal friends has been asking around for new jobs or new opportunities out there fearing they may lose their current jobs. While many companies are facing a difficult time, other industries has been booming especially ones dealing with products or services with a strong presence online.

item.title: Become a Successful Online Teacher - Teach Online Students
item.description: Online course creation has never been easier, faster, or simpler. But creating a bestseller on Udemy that reaches a wide audience, has an impact, and makes your significant money is difficult. This course is designed for people who are really serious about their online instructor careers. If you are beyond the stage of being impressed with yourself just for having an online course and want more, then this course is for you.

item.title: Acting course - tools of acting
item.description: In this acting course, Ram Choudhary teach about acting (camera & theater), diction, navras, characterisation, body language, dialogue delivery & importance of backstories ( how to bring real-life experiences into every role and how to build your own characters). As a trained actor from theater ,he uses advanced acting techniques to portray complex characters. he introduces students to various methods and techniques which he use to teach and enhance their acting skills.

item.title: Selling Your Knowledge: Learn How to Make Money Online
item.description: One of the greatest ways to earn an income fast and consistently is by using what you already know and teaching it to someone else! As Bill Nye once said: "Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't." This is true and is why you don't have to worry about what you don't know because I guarantee that you most likely have a skill or know something that you know you can teach to someone else (trust me).

item.title: Sell Online Courses: The Course Description Writing Formula
item.description: If your course description is not written in the right way, you get less students. Write a course description that really sells by using a proven formula. Also, writing a course description can take a long time. But when you have a step-by-step process, it becomes far easier and faster. I wrote this course description in less than 15 minutes. My name is Ian Stables. At the time of writing this, I have more than 51,000 students.

item.title: How to Create Amazing Visuals For Your eLearning Content
item.description: Visuals have a critical role in a successful digital learning experience. The goal of any eLearning content is to make an impact on the users and facilitate learning, which eventually will upgrade the learner in specific real-life situations. The overall goal of any learning is always to reach a desired development in the learner´s behavior, actions. The 90 % of corporate eLearning courses are super boring and that´s mostly because of the poor visuals.

item.title: Udemy bootcamp: How to create a STUNNING course Unofficial
item.description: Let's start with the basics, right now you are a person that surely has something to offer, a certain knowledge that you have and that you think you will be able to teach. By creating this course my main objective was to help you by giving you all the tips thats I used to create online content on different plateforms. So if you are someone that is ready to start with udemy and creat your own content this course is for you !

item.title: Online Course Creation: Teach an Online Course
item.description: Online Course Creation can be simple once you have mastered the art of speaking in front of a camera. Imagine yourself delivering an entire course filled with great lectures. You can be the star of your own classroom--online. You can be a confident and engaging instructor of your own course. In this Online course creation Course you will earn the following: *How to speak and lecture with confidence throughout your online course creation process

item.title: Basic Arabic Grammar
item.description: In order to read, write, speak and understand Arabic, it is important to learn the grammar. Arabic grammar can be tough and intimidating, but it doesn’t have to be. Grammar here means the important words that give structure to a sentence, in addition to the structures themselves. In linguistics, we call such words "function words". When you know these words, you’ll be able to recognize them and use them easily to understand and build simple sentences.

item.title: Online Course Creation - Create & Sell Online Courses
item.description: Whatever your profession or experience may be, if you’ve ever wanted to turn your knowledge, skills or talents into a profitable online course, then you’re in the right place! This professional masterclass training program provides absolutely everything you'll need to successfully build your own online business creating and selling online courses. From deciding what you should be teaching, to marketing to the right audience, to buying the right equipment and knowing what to charge, I'll walk you through everything you need to know in order to create and launch a successful online course that customers will happily pay for!

item.title: Adli Bilişim/Dijital Kursu
item.description: Günümüzün dijital dünyasında önemli bir konu olan siber dünya ile ilgili hukuki ve kanuni, ama öncesindeki süreçte de önemli bir yer teşkil ederek üzerinde bilimsel ve pratik çalışmalar yapılmaya ihtiyaç duyulan adli Dijital Bilişim, bu kursta detaylarıyla incelenerek, kursu takip edenler için hem pratikte, günlük yaşamda, hem de mesleki anlamda önemli yeterlilik bilgileri ve tecrübeleri vermektedir. Bu kurs, Adli Bilişim ile ilgili temel ve genel bilgileri içermektedir. Dersler, akıcı ve anlaşılır bir şekilde olup, her düzeyden başlayabileceğiniz şekilde tasarlanmıştır.

item.title: 10X Amazon Ebay Dropshipping Fba Wholesale 2021 Para Kazanma
item.description: 2021 yılında hala ticarete başlamadıysan bu kurs tam sana göre. Ben Akın Yılmaz, takım arkadaşlarımla beraber sizlerin ticaretinizi geliştirmenizi ve internet üzerinden gelir elde edebilmeniz için sizlere Udemy üzerinden Ücretisiz eğitimler hazırlıyoruz. Temel ticaret mantığını anlamak ve kendinizi e-ticaret alanında geliştirmek için lütfen bu kursa ve Akın Yılmaz kanalına göz atın. Buralarda sahip olmasını isteyeceğiniz çok kıymetli bilgiler var. Ve siz bu bilgileri edinmelisiniz. Artık kendi paranızı kazanma vaktiniz geldi. Tek yapmanız gereken aksiyon alıp artık başlamak ve ticaretinizi geliştirmek.

item.title: Fundamental Question on Digital Marketing
item.description: Dear Students, Are you Preparing for Interview in Digital Marketing? Don’t be stressed, Take our Digital Marketing quiz and prepare yourself for the Interview. With this Digital Marketing Quiz, we are going to build your confidence by providing tips and tricks to solve Digital Marketing based questions. Here you will get Digital Marketing based MCQ for your next Job or Exam. In Digital Marketing Quiz, there will be a series of practice tests where you can test your Knowledge in the field of Digital Marketing.

item.title: High School Organic Chemistry 1
item.description: Chemistry is fun when you learn from the best tutors. At Go2uni, we present you “High School Organic Chemistry 1”. We start from the basics and take a deep dive with clear examples and exercises to ensure every concept is understood. Go2uni presents seasoned tutors with years of experience to offer you "High School Organic Chemistry 1", the organic chemistry course you need to ace your exams. This course will demystify Chemistry with tonnes of examples, work through exercises and take-home exercises.
